meanings.definition: The act of moving or agitating something.
meanings.sent1: The gentle stirrings of the leaves in the wind were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: I felt the stirrings of excitement as the concert began.
meanings.sent3: The stirrings of the cake batter made it look like a dancing party.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the quiet night, the stirrings of the forest came alive.
meanings.sent5: The stirrings of the ocean waves created a soothing rhythm.

meanings.definition: A slight indication or sign of activity or emotion.
meanings.sent1: There were stirrings of discontent among the students about the new rule.
meanings.sent2: The stirrings of hope in her heart kept her going during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The stirrings of hunger in his stomach made him raid the fridge.
meanings.sent4: In the silence, the stirrings of fear crept into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The stirrings of joy in the room were contagious, spreading smiles all around.
